mapper.insert: INSERT /* com.theshoes.jsp.board.model.dao.BoardDAO#registNotice() */ INTO BOARD A ( A.BOARD_NO , A.BOARD_ID , A.BOARD_CATEGORY_NO , A.BOARD_TITLE , A.BOARD_CONTENT , A.BOARD_REGDATE , A.BOARD_HIT , A.CATEGORY_ORDER ) VALUES ( SEQ_BOARD_CODE.NEXTVAL , #{ boardId } , 1 , #{ boardTitle } , #{ boardContent } , #{ boardRegDate } , 1 , SEQ_CATEGORY_NOTICE_CODE.NEXTVAL )
mapper.select:
SELECT /* com.theshoes.jsp.board.model.dao.BoardDAO#selectAllNoticeList() */ A.RNUM , A.BOARD_NO , A.BOARD_ID , A.BOARD_CATEGORY_NO , A.BOARD_TITLE , A.BOARD_CONTENT , A.BOARD_REGDATE , A.BOARD_HIT , A.CATEGORY_ORDER FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.BOARD_NO , B.BOARD_ID , B.BOARD_CATEGORY_NO , B.BOARD_TITLE , B.BOARD_CONTENT , B.BOARD_REGDATE , B.BOARD_HIT , B.CATEGORY_ORDER FROM (SELECT C.BOARD_NO , C.BOARD_ID , C.BOARD_CATEGORY_NO , C.BOARD_TITLE , C.BOARD_CONTENT , C.BOARD_REGDATE , C.BOARD_HIT , C.CATEGORY_ORDER FROM BOARD C WHERE C.BOARD_CATEGORY_NO = 1 ORDER BY C.CATEGORY_ORDER DESC) B
WHERE ROWNUM <= #{ endRow,jdbcType=VARCHAR } ) A WHERE A.RNUM >= #{ startRow, jdbcType=VARCHAR }
SELECT /* com.theshoes.jsp.board.model.dao.BoardDAO#selectNoticeTotalCount() */ COUNT(*) FROM BOARD A WHERE A.BOARD_CATEGORY_NO = 1

SELECT A.BOARD_NO , A.BOARD_ID , A.BOARD_CATEGORY_NO , A.BOARD_TITLE , A.BOARD_CONTENT , A.BOARD_REGDATE , A.BOARD_HIT , A.CATEGORY_ORDER FROM BOARD A WHERE A.BOARD_CATEGORY_NO = 1 AND A.CATEGORY_ORDER = #{ categoryOrder }
